src:
Jokowi Menyorot Rangkulan Tak Biasa Surya Paloh ke Presiden PKS
07 Nov 2019, 09:34 by Andhika Prasetia
Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) menyoroti rangkulan Ketua Umum NasDem Surya Paloh ke Presiden PKS Sohibul Iman. Jokowi menilai rangkulan itu tak biasa.
Jokowi menyinggung soal rangkulan Paloh ke Sohibul itu kala berpidato di HUT ke-55 Partai Golkar, di Hotel Sultan, kawasan Senayan, Jakarta Pusat, Rabu (6/11/2019). Rangkulan itu disampaikannya saat menyapa Paloh yang juga hadir dalam acara itu.
"Bapak Surya Paloh yang kalau kita lihat malam hari ini lebih cerah dari biasanya. Sehabis pertemuan beliau dengan Pak Sohibul Iman di PKS. Wajahnya cerah setelah beliau berdua berangkulan dengan Pak Sohibul Iman," kata Jokowi.
Rangkulan antara Paloh dan Sohibul sendiri terjadi saat keduanya melakukan pertemuan pada Rabu, 30 Oktober 2019 lalu. Paloh waktu itu berkunjung ke kantor DPP PKS, di Jalan TB Simatupang, Jakarta Selatan.
Jokowi mengaku tak tahu makna dari rangkulan itu. Namun, eks Gubernur DKI Jakarta itu merasa tak pernah dirangkul seerat itu oleh ketum parpol koalisinya tersebut.
"Saya tidak tahu maknanya apa tapi rangkulannya tidak seperti biasanya. Tidak pernah saya dirangkul seperti itu oleh Bang Surya seerat beliau merangkul Pak Sohibul Iman," ujarnya.
Dia pun mengaku telah menanyakan langsung perihal pertemuan dan rangkulan itu langsung kepada Paloh. Namun, Paloh, kata Jokowi, enggan menjawab.
"Tadi di holding saya tanyakan ada apa tapi nanti di lain waktu mau dijawab. Saya tanya dong karena beliau masih di koalisi pemerintah," kata Jokowi.

(mae/fjp)
text:
Jokowi Highlights Surya Paloh's Unusual Embrace to PKS President
Nov 7 2019, 09:34 by Andhika Prasetia
Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) highlighted the embrace of Chairman of NasDem Surya Paloh to PKS President Sohibul Iman. Jokowi thinks the hug is unusual.
Jokowi mentioned Paloh's embrace to Sohibul when giving a speech at the 55th Anniversary of the Golkar Party, at the Sultan Hotel, Senayan area, Central Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019). The embrace was conveyed when greeting Paloh who was also present at the event.
"Mr. Surya Paloh who if we see tonight is brighter than usual. After his meeting with Mr. Sohibul Iman at PKS. His face was bright after he embraced both with Pak Sohibul Iman," Jokowi said.
The embrace between Paloh and Sohibul occurred when the two held a meeting on Wednesday, 30 October 2019. At that time Paloh visited the PKS DPP office, on Jalan TB Simatupang, South Jakarta.
Jokowi claimed not to know the meaning of the embrace. However, the former Governor of DKI Jakarta felt that he had never been embraced that tightly by his coalition political party chief.
"I do not know what it means but the embrace is not as usual. I have never been embraced like that by Bang Surya as closely as he embraces Mr. Sohibul Iman," he said.
He also claimed to have asked directly about the meeting and the embrace directly to Paloh. However, Paloh, said Jokowi, was reluctant to answer.
"Earlier at the holding I asked what was wrong, but at a later time I wanted to answer. I asked because he was still in the government coalition," Jokowi said.

(mae / fjp)
